content.detailedDescription:
My wife as and i was sitting on our front steps talking. we noticed a star like object above a tree. when we both were able to see this "star" that appeared out of no where it started to move. i went right above us. it didn't flash or strobe in any way. it looked as a star. it was moved at the same speed. we moved to make sure it didn't disappear from our view. the whole time we thought it would flash as a plane, for the simple fact we live under the flight path of the local airport. it didn't make any movement as a plane would. also, it didn't flash or strobe like a plane would, we were looking for it, because both of us have become quite the sky watchers we have become because we have both have had previous "ufo" sightings. it lasted for about a minute before slowly this "star" just slowly disappeared into "nothing". 
i have never expirenced anything like this before in my life before and i can say without a doubt this is a craft from another world. 
and all we wanted was a pizza and we got this once in and life time expirence
content.summary: It appeard as a star but moving.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were outside joking around on my parents driveway at about 8 o'clock at night. i remember he was trying to tell my something when he stops what he was trying to say points up to the sky an shouts "dude look". i turned my head around and saw a bright white light   object coming toward us from the north east. it was about 20 feet in diameter flew at an altitude of about 35 feet and went at about 60 to 70 miles an hour (and it didn't make any noise). it went fast so we only saw for about 7 seconds before it disappeared to the north west. at first we thought it was a search light from helicopter but we didn't hear anything and just before it disappeared over the houses we could tell that it was illuminating it's own light. we told one of our friends about this and he and him dad saw something similar just one week earlier at his uncles house just two blocks away.
content.summary: Bright white like object moveing at 60 to 70 miles an hour at a little over tree top level

content.detailedDescription:
I'd just watched a special on the phoenix lights and felt myself opening up to the reality of et phenomenon. i'd gone to bed thinking about what we have that might be of interest to ets. i'd been asleep for less than an hour when i was suddenly awakened by something, i don't know what. right away i became aware of frantic clicking sounds, insect or bat like, in both my head and outside of it, above me. this was very unusual. i've never felt anything like it before. i removed my earplugs to see how this might change the sound and thought it odd that it made no difference to the volume of the sound in my head. it was like what we imagine telepathy might be like. very clear, loud, and fast..As if whomever was making it was upset about something. i had the feeling this was related to my sudden waking.

i'd been out of bed and to walk around the room while taking out my earplugs. this went on for about four minutes before i returned to bed and lay staring at the opposite wall to try and make sense of this odd occurrence. at the time i did not know about insect-like ets, only the greys and communion's blue people. gradually i became aware of blue-green lights reflecting on the inside wall i was looking at. there are no roads nearby and our neighbor keeps a red bulb going most nights, but not this one. the lights blinked only 3-4 times then they were suddenly gone. the sound had left before i returned to bed. i believe it had faded gradually.

i know this is not a lot to consider but i believe in the work you're doing and in reporting what happens to us. my personal hope is to eventually discover whether anything similar has happened to anyone else so i might confirm its origin. it felt to me as if my waking had interrupted something. immediately prior to waking i dreamed--rare for me after so little sleep--of being in a sort of assembly-line with an aunt. we were having a disagreement and i said, "but i'm the one helping you out here" my only association with this aunt is of her choice to raise her family in the inner city, among a far more diverse population than my own mother chose. childhood visits to these cousins were always filled with new and unusual experiences and friends. i would never speak to any of my aunts as i did in the dream. 

there is no possibility that i dreamt the sound or visual stimuli. i am certain of my wakefulness from the moment i became aware of the strange sound sensations.
content.summary: Middle of the night sounds and lights

content.detailedDescription:
Location:  topsail island, north carolina.
dates:  june 16th-18th 2014 (online reports indicate events have been occurring the entire week)
times:  each evening any time during the 9 and 10 o'clock hours.
distance from observer:  unknown.
distance from ground:  unknown.

the first two nights observed, a series of one to four orange lights of varying intensity appeared over the atlantic ocean.  lights would suddenly appear in the sky, varying height (and assumed varying distance from observer).  there seemed to be no organizational pattern or formation.  on the evenings of the 16th and 17th, the lights would only appear, then disappear.  this lasted for anywhere from 30 to 45 minutes.  after appearing, disappearing, and reappearing, lights vanished and the skies were normal for the remainder of the evening.

apologies for incomplete or inaccurate reports of the first two night's events.  i wasn't planning on reporting it until the events of the 18th took place.  had i known that i was going to submit a report, i would have paid more close attention to the first two nights's events.

on the 18th, around 9:00 p.M., ten witnesses saw three lights appear in the sky above the ocean.  these lights behaved as they have the previous two nights, with the exception of one light 'splitting' and becoming two.  some objects were noticeably closer than others.  when viewed through binoculars, one could tell that each light was actually two lights, one at each end of the object. the closer lights (when viewed through binoculars) appeared to have a vague disc shape, with a light on each end.  the most notable event of the 'show' was the ejection of an object from one of the lights, which traveled right across the sky (south).  the entire event took place over the course of about 40 minutes.

after the lights had disappeared, two military helicopters flew the length of the island (north to south) along the shoreline.  when they reached the south end, one turned around, looped over the island, and then flew over our house, directly toward the location of the lights.  upon reaching the approximate location of the objects, the helicopter turned around and flew back inland, making one final lap along the shoreline (north to south) before returning to wherever it came from.

attached is a three and a half minute video of a portion of the event, taken with a droid ultra phone.  the video has not been doctored in any way, and no attempts have been made to 'clean up' the image quality.
content.summary: Series of orange lights, randomly arranged, appearing and disappearing over atlantic ocean

content.detailedDescription:
I was ontop of my apartment bldg looking at the city a little after 9pm.  they caught the peripheral of my vision.  at first i thought the objects were asteroids falling - but then others around the other objects began flashing which revealed more than the initial objects i had seen (no noise).  they were moving from west to east in the night sky.  blue-white flash that would pulsate.  as they traveling together to the east they began to change position and made a "u" and then made the letter "v".  this was witnessed by two friends.  we saw about 2-3 more objects travel behind the majority of the original objects observed - appeared as if they were trying to play catch up.

about 10-15 minutes had gone by and two airplanes with different colors and flashing lights with noise travelled close to each other following the objects.

the objects continue in a southeastern type direction and headed into the clouds where they hung out and seemed stationary for a long while.

how i feel:  confused.  upset.  scared somewhat.  not sure what i saw. 

i called 911 and local tv station and nobody has reported anything.  i spoke with a friend of mine who lives about 20 miles south of me and she saw them along with her children - the same exact thing.
content.summary: Blue white objects

content.detailedDescription: i was at home , my hobby is photography. i was taking a couple of pictures of the full moon on friday 13, when i looked at the shots on my computer , noticed  a dark spot. i blew it up , looks like a ufo to me. i did not notice it when i took the picture. i crop the picture, blow it up, then boost it and it is plain to me . i would like you to look at the picture.
content.summary: Taking a picture of full moon on this last cycle, got something in picture that looks like a saucer shaped object

content.detailedDescription: My family and myself re about to leave a friends house. it's about 9:15 pm eastern time. about to pull out of the driveway and see bright orange lights, three of them. a fourth off to my left.. ish.? then, lights just blinked out 1 by 1. goosebumps and a terrible feeling in the pit of my stomach. my kids were terrified. they are 4 & 5 and knew what was going on on. no planes around, no sound, no nothing. there is a military base close by, although this was no military vehicle. it was about a half a mile away probably right over the ocean. i'm sure folks down there got quite a show, if they witnessed it. we are used to seeing all kinds of military craft. this was not normal. the strangest orange lights i've ever seen. this would be my first encounter and my husbands second. i can't stop looking up. i'm scared.
content.summary: 4 orange lights, 3 in a line, a 4rth off to my left. hovering then slowly moving n.Lights then blinked out

content.detailedDescription:
I looked up to see a jet traveling from lax in a ne direction.  dozens of planes take this route daily.  i thought it was louder than normal planes, but when i focused on it, it was a pretty normal sighting.  probably a 737 or a-319 at about 12kft.  
as i looked away, i noticed a bright ball slightly behind the plane.  i re-focused on the plane, then found the object.  as i watched it, i noticed a brownish/red ball smaller, heading north of the bright one.  i hustled through my house to the back deck and re-focused on the object.  i had my wife look at it, and then she went in the house to retrieve the binoculars.  
with the glasses, i watched the object slowly drift to the west right above my head.  i gave the binocs to my wife, and as she looked, the red ball came back into view.  she handed them back, and i watched the red ball orbit slowly around the main white object.  not an exact circular path, but it came in closer proximity, then drifted away.  
by now, 10-15 min had passed, and i got tied of looking straight up.  so i laid on my back on the deck and watched the objects laying down, looking straight up.  over the next 15 min or so, i watched the red ball come and go, as well as 3 more white balls come into view.
i estimate the objects to be at least 100kft above ground level.  i say this because i was an engineer on the redbull stratos jump.  when felix baumgartner jumped from the capsule, the balloon was clearly visible from the ground.  the diameter of his balloon was approx 100 feet in diameter at 130kft.  the objects i viewed were smaller based on the same altitude.  so i would estimate the objects were smaller than 50 ft. in diameter.  and like the stratos jump, which took place just after dawn, the light of the sun illuminated the balloon as a bright silver-white.  the sun did the same thing to the objects i observed, though it was late afternoon, with the setting sun reflecting brightly upon the objects.
i tried unsuccessfully to record the objects on my cell phone cam.  eventually, the objects drifted east into darker skies, and i was straining to stay focused.  i gave up after about 40 min of observation.
content.summary: A bright white ping pong ball-ish objedt was orbited by a similar red ball, and other white ones.

content.detailedDescription: Driving near a large shopping mall, i noticed a unusually large set of lights flying slowly toward my position.  it appeared too large for a plane, and moving too slowly for a plane, but not slow enough to be a blimp.  it had a triangular or delta wing like shape that was evident as it seemed to change direction over the shopping mall.  i lowered my window but herd no noise and was probably no more than 5 or 6 hundred feet away.  i pulled out my cell phone and started taking a video of it but buy this point i was directly adjacent to it and the image does not show its size front on but from the side. it does however show it's speed and the blinking lights.  unfortunately, from this angle it looks like a helicopter but again no noise, and the light pattern is all wrong for a helicopter.  my wife was driving so she couldn't pay much attention to it but she did see it too.  shortly after first sporting it she pulled into a parking lot to go into a store and i watched it continue to travel away from us until lit moved below the skyline.  it defiantly had me excited, and i attempted to report it to the local news, but they didn't seem to take much notice.  i am 50 years old and i've never seen anything i couldn't explain or justify in my mind as identifiable before.  about 10 years ago a local news story reported something like this seen by police near scot afb, which is about 40 miles from where i saw this event.
content.summary: Large slow moving delta wing shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home after visiting the air force museum at around 3:30 pm. i noticed something in the sky in front of me. it looked like sunlight reflecting off of something. at first it appeared as a white orb around the size of a dime held at arms' length, i assume that it was light reflecting off of whatever it was but i am not certain. what i am assuming to be the reflection stopped and there was a silver cigar shaped craft moving north. the craft seemed to elongate while moving and then vanished. had it not disappeared i would have thought it was just a plane seen from an odd angle, but the disappearance has me perplexed.
content.summary: A silver cigar shaped craft vanished in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
Mid december 2013 at cabin near wilseyville, ca at 11pm on a partly foggy night, subject looked out her window and saw three saucer shaped craft hovering among the trees at about 180 feet from the ground, and 150 feet from her home. they were in formation, with one in front and two behind it.
they were silver colored and the front one had a white light in the middle.
near to them was another craft, slightly smaller with a bright orange moon shaped top and the bottom of the craft seemed to resemble "melted cheese" the effect did not change but stayed intact. subject watched for 25 minutes and was frozen with fear. subject finally closed the windows and moved to the bedroom, but didn't sleep. subject was afraid the craft were going to enter her home. the next morning all the craft were gone.  upon questioning neighbors, they said they had previously seen ufos and wilseyville was considered a "hot spot". subject had never in years visiting there, seen a ufo before and subject is selling the property for health reasons.
content.summary: Subject saw three saucers hovering over and behind trees

content.detailedDescription:
The shooting star ufo.  star gazing, thought i saw my firsr meteor of the night, a short streak of light in the western wing of the northern cross kept looking, 1 second later, saw another trail down range from the first, saw another down range, the fourth streak of light startled me because it changed direction 15 degrees north.  as i kept track of this (i believe to be america's newest space craft) it changed direction again, this time 15 degrees to the south.  was that a course correction i thought.  the last light i saw was a star like pulse burst.  all this happened in 10 to 12 seconds.  at first i thought it was a meteor skipping off the atmosphere.
but when it changed direction, not once but twice, i was convinced it was a controlled craft.
content.summary: Star gazing, thought i saw my firsr meteor, kept looking, 1 second later, saw another trail down range from the first

content.detailedDescription: At 9:45 pm, my girlfriend and i went out back to lock up for the night, i saw one light then my gf saw another. they looked like satellites but there were 2 and they were near each other. they moved ne from sw very high up. one glowed bright for a second then dimmed. they both slowly went away. i observed one through 50x binoculars but couldn't distinguish what the heck it was. i also saw a satellite zip past in the same relative direction. i love to sit out in the back yard at night and watch satellites and such so i know what is what usually. aviation background.  no alcohol or drugs were involved. thank you very much for the opportunity to report these events. something is here i know it. i with a witness saw the hb police helicopter chasing a bronze colored sphere in 1997 (on file with mufon) in broad daylight and i know for a fact it wasn't us.
content.summary: 9:45 pm 6/17/14.. we saw 2 lights overhead glowing, moved ne then gone.

content.detailedDescription: Sunday night about 10:30 pm june 15 subject and his son were walking near their home when they spotted a multicolored orb in the sky. the orb changed colors by fading into one color and then another. lights were green, yellow, white,and blue. they watched for 20 minutes until it slowly crossed the sky. it seemed as big as a two bedroom house and crossed over them moving west to east. they later saw a bright white light hovering in the sky. the moon was just coming up and the cleavland airport is near by.  the orbs made no sound as they went over. they seemed a little higher than treetop. subject and his son would like to know what they saw and if anyone else saw it too.
content.summary: Subject and son were walking and saw a multicolored orb

content.detailedDescription: Driving hazmat load of crude oil from everglades too pt everglades when crossing the canal the orb pooped through thin air about 200 ft in front of me on i75 over the canal following it north with a sparkler looking exhaust ,round but flat to the eye with a plasma appearance  about 80 mph bobbling like a balloon but  heading up canal .
content.summary: Entered 100 to 200ft north bound over canal through dimensional door as i crossed bridge on alligator alley (i75) saw it appear half way then completely was round but flat with sparkler exhaust bobbling up and down right and left ,plasma looking side .

content.detailedDescription:
Subject was up at 2am looking out window at ducks when a cylinder of light tilted at a 30 degree angle floated by about 12 inches off the grass.
subject watched the shaft of white light move slowly by until it was out of sight.The shaft of light was 8 to 10 feet long and 5 to 8 inches wide. it made no sound. no aircraft or boats were in the area. lake near by is mostly for birds, not boats allowed. subject says he saw one duck apparently paralyzed but returned to motion later  subject lives near daytona airport but no aircraft were in the area at that time.  subject is interested to find out if anyone else saw the light in his area and wants to talk to a local mufon person.
content.summary: A cylinder of light floated by window 12 inches off grass

content.detailedDescription:
In 1977, i was stationed at edwards afb, california. worked in security police, law enforcement. training a newly assigned airman: area familiarization, patrol zone, procedures. at approximately 0200 hours we drove up too the rpl, rocket propulsion laboratory, in our security police vehicle. i drove up a ridge line, so i could show him, a complete view of area. while observing the area,we spotted a black large disc shaped object, appearing to be sitting on top of one of the laboratory buildings. my trainee asked me, "what is that,". i said, "i have no idea." the object started to slowly rise up, a couple hundred feet from building, than slowly started moving in a circular motion, toward our position. i raised the microphone, to our vehicle radio, tried to transmit, when realized our radio, was dead. we both attempted to use our portable walkie talkie radios, both were also dead. all our radio's had been checked, before and after guard mount. next i turned on our light bar, as a signal device, although we were in a desolated area, many miles from main base. the lights on the light bar rotated for 10 seconds, than they went dead.  could not get them to come back on. we had no emergency flares. when the disc was approximately 100 feet away, our vehicle engine died. i could not re start it. i took out a remington 870 shotgun, from its mount. i opened my vehicle door, gripping the shotgun, in a death grip. the disc shaped object, a glassy black color about the size, of two c5a aircraft, wingtip to wingtip. it made no sound, totally silent. saw no lights. i looked for any type of markings, insignia saw none. the disc stopped, right above our vehicle. we both just stared up at it. it seemed to stay their for just a few minutes. it started moving again. i could not see any type of propulsion system. again, no sound, no lights. it rose up, too approximately 2,000 feet. it stopped. it started rotating from a horizontal position, to a complete vertical position. stopped, when completely vertical. than the disc started spinning, rotating very rapidly and shot almost straight up into the air, was gone from visible sight within seconds. all our systems started working. the engine was on, light bar was rotating and our vehicle radio was working. desk sergeant was calling us, i answered said they had sent patrols out looking for us. we had missed our radio check. evidently two hours of time, was missing. i looked at my watch, was 0430 in morning.
we both filled out 1569 incident/complaint reports. both would be read, that morning by the base commander. the desk sergeant said object had been reported by are radar, when it shot into the sky.
two days later we both were told to report to base commander.  when we were outside his office we were met by a full bird colonel, wearing no name tag. he was very tall, at least 6'4, gray hair, and sparking deep blue eyes. i went into a office with him. he told me to draw a sketch on chalk board, of the object. i did. then i described exactly what had happen. he said nothing, had no recording device. he asked not one question. i got the strange feeling, he already knew, what had happen. i told him i would take a polygraph tests. he said, that was not necessary. he said he believed i had seen something. he told me, to never tell anyone what i had seen. ever. i left. my trainee went in next.
a week later i was called back to see base commander. outside his office were two very large men, in suits. looked like linebackers. i knocked than entered his office. it was the real base commander. he told me to sit down. he told me to sign these papers. i asked to read them, he said that was not necessary. i said i will read them first. it was a nondisclosure agreement. it stated i actually had saw a helicopter, on a training mission, with all lights out. i looked at the colonel. "sir, this was not a helicopter: it had no rotors, no blades, no sound. sir, this is a lie. this is not what i saw." when i started to tell him, he told me immediately to shut up. he looked scared. he told me, he did not want to know what i had saw. this is a national security issue. he said, "please sign these papers, for both of us."
"if you do not sign these papers, you will go with those people, outside my office." "you really don't want to go with those people." i asked if i could get a copy, of these papers, he shook his head. i told him, i am signing these papers under duress and protest. i signed them. several weeks later i got a remote assignment, to go overseas. i have no reason to make up a story, like this. i am a highly decorated veteran, that held some very high security clearances. i never believed in ufo's until i had this strange encounter.
content.summary: Sighted disc shape object at rocket propulsion laboratory, edwards afb, california

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for friends to show up that were traveling a long distance, they showed up around 1am, around 3 am i looked outside and had seen a cloud which was abnormally lit up and that was changing shape. i took my cell phone outside and began to capture the cloud however the camera did not capture the cloud...It captured what was inside of it creating the light.. the videos tell the rest of the story
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo hovering over balzac, alta. display lasted 1hr 15min, various types of ufo's

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: In the middle of august in 1966, subjects were driving home after midnight and saw a triangle light over 200 feet in the air. they noticed it was higher than the forest ranger tower near by. they stopped the car and looked at it with binoculars and saw a dark human like figure moving about in side the triangle of light, the figure seemed to be sitting at a table and moving like it was doing something. subjects heard no sound and saw no ship or form around the triangle. like it was an open door. they watched for 20 minutes and left. the next day they came back and nothing was there except  cattle in a field.  subjects wanted to report this so it would be on file in case other people who saw this finally would report it too. they don't feel the need to be contacted about this event. subjects never reported this event at the time because they did not know who to report it to.
content.summary: Subject and wife driving at midnight saw triange light high up in sky

content.detailedDescription: We observed a orange ball coming in our direction around 9:30 pm . sitting outside with friends and family it caught my eye. friends  all jumped up and we watched it pass the house the went behind the house. it was on a straight path,no noise , no pulsating or anything. we watched it till it left the area and just vanished out of sight.All in all im a star gazer and i was pretty excited,as were the rest of friends that had seen it.I have asked others in town if they had seen it and several people had seen it as well across town..
content.summary: The object was silent was a bright orange in color and followed in a slow path until we couldnt see it any longer .

content.detailedDescription:
I was at american heart association charity event on may 7, 2014 the event took place at citizens bank ballpark in philadelphia i was waiting my turn to hit baseballs and while talking to a security guard that i know i noticed he was looking at something over my shoulder and i turned to look at it also i said to the guard it looks like a helicopter with someone hanging out of it as soon as i had said that it looked like a helicopter with a banner hanging from it no sooner had i said that and what i thought was a helicopter turned slightly and proceeded to change shape and the only way i can describe it is it was it looked like three bubble shapes and it's stayed there for another second or two and then ascended into the overcast sky i heard no noise and never saw the object again the garden i looked at each other with disbelief and i asked him if he just saw what i saw and he told me exactly what i thought i had just seen he had said whatever it was changed shape so i knew i wasn't crazy and i just been hallucinating we were the only two in the ballpark that had seen it from what i know we spoke with a couple ushers and other people that were around us and told them what we saw but they had not seen it i thought i would report this to see if anyone else possibly could have seen it besides me and the security guard 
my feelings after seeing it were i had just seen something amazing and i couldn't tell you if it was man made or not.  after the object changed shape it simply and slowly rose up into the clouds and i never saw it again
content.summary: I was at a charity event at citizens bank park while talking to security guard we witnessed an object hovering near the ballpark and it looked like a helicopter at first until it turned and changed shape

content.detailedDescription: James blunt on facebook. the singer who made the song your beautiful now its moon landing  i know why  he has  aliens activities look closer he was in the military what he has done and they sing for him look closer you'll see it .. maybe this house also in london ask  mother and sister what he has hitting and activities right on his profile facebook. call me i have more information cuz he won't leave my house these pictures are from the front of my house he's stalking me and using them to terrifying  me.  asap please
content.summary: Ask james blunt

content.detailedDescription: I viewed a home address using google earth going to street view.  i turned the view upward to the sky to find the ufo.  i then searched other nearby addresses using google earth and could not see any other objects in the sky possibly suggesting it was not a plane or other such object and also suggesting that the object had traveled at a very high speed.
content.summary: Object found on a google earth search.  enter:4509 nolan lane, las vegas.  go to street view.  look up and west.  also checking other addresses in the area show no objects in the sky suggesting it was not plane. etc.  shows speed as well.

content.detailedDescription: hear news helicopters over head went out to look. one caught my eye because it appeared to have a rotating light going around it. went in to get the binoculars and could see it was two crafts. it was predawn with cloud cover so they were in same vicinity over the seal beach naval weapons station. helicopter appeared to be observing it, flying around it. craft did not move. only the helicopter made a sound. appeared to be a disc with white lights rotating around it.I was only wearing shorts so went in to put on a shirt and came back out and it was gone. helicopter appeared to be searching for it.Was another helicopoter some ways away but behind me by a some distance. helicopters were there filming freeway closure.
content.summary: Disc shape lights white lights rotating around craft. news helicopter very near and had to see it. two news helicopters in vicinity filming freeway closure but one was very close. i could hear the helicopter but not the craft. above weapons station.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I had read on facebook during the day (6/17/14 ) that ufos have been seen since sat all over marion. they flashed like fire flies. so when i went to get cigarette s at 9:30 pm i was watching the sky hoping to see onemy 16 yr old was driving south on st rt 4 heading home when to our left i say an object that was roundish star shaped flashing white strobe style matching our speed but up in the sky not high but telphone pole top height. i was so excited when we got home five mins later i got everyone outside and tokd them what was on fb  and at that point the ufo was over our property then it vanished. thats when we say all of the smaller round ufos that blinked whit yellow and red everywhere. they would go fast and turn suddenly then stop and go total white and still like trying to blend in as a star some turned yelowish white others bright white some woulf fade completely out. then out of the blue they would start blinking all the colors again and take off. they went every direction it was amazing and i cant believe how many there were. about 1200 am we head a plane but never say it. right after we gad these bright silver oorbs appear beside my boyfriends car by this tone it was just ne and my 12 yr old he pointed it out. then we saw theses silver fire flies there were like nothing ive ever seen.  that lasted maybe five mins. then we went out back by the back fields thats where we saw a silver fluid like ball on the ground it moved like a slinky and vanished i was so excited i didnt put much thought into it. while outback  to are left four good size strobe ufos appeared and flew past us out toward middle of the field. when they reached infront of us it was only two about the middle between the ground and clouds too low for a plane and made no sounds what so ever. rt as they passed i had this weird feeling and looked up and there rt above us low enough i could see it was a trinagle ufo like ive seen on history 2 ufo shows. i saw it on ur program also. it was all black with white lights on each corner with a small red accent light.In the center was a green blue sphere that seemed to glow. i was floored by how low it was and it was hardly moving.  it slowly passed over us and picked up speed we watched it go out over the field and we watched it until it disappeared  towards the back of the field.Never saw the trangle again but watched the blinky ones and a few strobe ones in the distance until about 150/2 am all the sudden they seemed to vanish as fast as they appeared.  we tried to video the ufo and take pics on our  smart phone but nithing showed up its all black. i am so happy and excited that finally i got to see a ufo well did i ever see ufos last night.I honestly hope one of ur field investors come here to-  night this is so weird three different types of  crafts. this is diffently worth sending someone to check out and  get some video and photos. mufons is more then welcome to come here and watch this. i cant wait for dark tonight so i can see them again. this is diffently a hear and no chance i dont think once there gone ill ever have an opportunity again to see. i hope mofon can this evening and witness all this. i am so into the super natural and acient ailens. i beleieve in all of iti have seen ghost since i can remember. i have dreamed of last night for so long and then to have it happen! i only listed only the people at my home. there are lots of facebook posting  about seeing this for days.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: There were atleast three different style ufos at 50 we stopped counting. they were everywhere it was amazing. the triangle was the most amazing.

content.detailedDescription: Ihave had reoccuring dreams of a experience some 20 years now both with a black alien that could not have been more than 10 to 15 feet from me. he appeared in one shape and then transformed into another shape. i do remember my 2 poodles were cowering as this thing was transpiring. this occurance was when i resided back in far rockaway ny. also my mom an aunt sister and mysel witnessed this tall being performing some sort of procedure on what looked tb a operating table big round light over this being and subject.
content.summary: Red eyes,no pupils definitely was scanning me,movement was right to left.Also appeared to threaten me.

content.detailedDescription: I was the passenger in my friends car, we were on our way to hang out and play guitar. approximately 6:30pm while still day time. it caught my friends eye first while driving. he said wish a ufo, i looked and said 3 ufos!. they were almost straight up above us. if you reach out and put your pinky finger up. they were about the size of half an average pinky nail. we could not see any detail besides looking either circular or spherical and white. they seemed pretty far away like a plane would be. they were in a triangle formation. if you reach out infront of you and put your index and pinky fingers out (like heavy metal devil horns) they were that far apart from each other. they did not seem to be moving.But after about  a minute they started to straighten out into a horizontal line. and then again just seemed to stay like that for a minute. most of this time i was fumbling to record it with my cell phone but it just didn't turn out due to the distance and movement of our car. then we had to make a turn and lost visual of them. we were pretty excited about the experience.  the sighting only took a couple of minutes. when we got to his place about 15 minutes later we started play guitar and about 5 minutes into it the power when out for a few seconds then back on for a few seconds then off for good. quickly found out it was at least his whole block. then since we couldn't jam he drove me home. neither of us saw the ufos on the way back. i tried to go on the internet at home to find out any info on the ufos but haven't heard anything. i just want to hear other people accounts and or hear about what if may have been.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 stationary round white objects in large triangle formation then straightened out into line way up in sky

content.detailedDescription: Two orange lights appeared about 30 degrees above the horizon in the east. as seen from my balcony on the sixth floor on the beach. one appeared  then another. both gone in 4  seconds. i had the impression that they were far out to sea. not fireworks.
content.summary: Two orange lights appeared for about 4 seconds then gone

content.detailedDescription: Four of us were having a beer in my yard, which is in the woods, and my friend said "hey look, a sattelite! so we all looked up to see a sattelite do an "s" curve. it was then we noticed 2 more coming from the same direction. they all looked alike and all seemed to make their own create their own light. but about that i'm not sure. all in all there were 5 or 6 objects that eventually headed north and disappeared. i have 3 witnesses for the initial sighting and one witness for the second. for the third, just 2 and my camera. d boy did i catch a doozie. i am still a bit shaken by the event buth i've been out here every night since. i would like to remain anonymous for the time being because so far folks think i just had too much libation. last sighting was 6/15/2014. same craft same everything but only one showed up on the 15th. i want to know who is piloting these crafts. grays? military? it seemed like they just vanished over lake buchanan about 5 miles to my north. 3 sightins in 8 days.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Long obsrservation of several objects interacting and changing course  3 times and got a good photo of one craft

content.detailedDescription: I was swimming in my backyard around 10:15pm on june 17th,2014.I was not looking up at the sky. if i had been, i wouldn't have seen the object. i looked across the backyard and saw a red light, approximately 15-20 feet in diameter. moving very slowly behind the tree line. there was absolutely no sound, and it was too dark outside to see anything but the light. it disappeared behind my house, and reappeared just beyond our property line, changed direction, and crossed the street to the right. and continued slowly, moving between a cemetery and the next street over. before disappearing behind the trees. it reappeared one more time, and had again changed direction and moved across highway 33 out of my sight.
content.summary: Huge, round, red light behind the tree line in my yard. at eye level.
